trans-unit.source: Provides data for an event that is raised by the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource"></xref> control after a data operation has completed.
trans-unit.target: Inneholder data for en hendelse som oppstår av den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource"> </xref> kontrollere etter et Dataoperasjonen er fullført.

trans-unit.source: The SqlDataSourceStatusEventArgs class is used in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Selected>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Updated>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Inserted>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Deleted> events to pass information about a database operation after it is performed by the data source control.
trans-unit.target: Klassen SqlDataSourceStatusEventArgs brukes i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Selected>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Updated>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Inserted>, og <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Deleted>hendelser til å sende informasjon om en databaseoperasjon når den utføres av dataene kilde kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Deleted> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Inserted> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Updated> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Selected>

trans-unit.source: This information includes the number of rows affected by the operation, the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommand> object that the data source used to perform the operation, and any exception information that resulted.
trans-unit.target: Denne informasjonen inkluderer antall rader som er berørt av operasjonen i <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommand>objekt som datakilden som brukes til å utføre operasjonen, og unntaksinformasjon resulterte.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommand>

trans-unit.source: By adding an event handler delegate to handle the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Selected>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Updated>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Inserted> or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Deleted> events, you can examine this data and perform any additional post processing required.
trans-unit.target: Ved å legge til en hendelse behandlingsprogrammet representant til å håndtere den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Selected>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Updated>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Inserted>eller <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Deleted>hendelser, kan du se disse dataene og utføre noen ekstra etterbehandling kreves.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Deleted> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Inserted> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Updated> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Selected>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource> control exposes many events that you can handle to work with the underlying data objects during the course of a data operation.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource>kontrollen viser mange hendelser som kan håndtere, for å fungere med underliggende dataobjekter i løpet av en Dataoperasjonen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource>

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the events and associated <xref:System.EventArgs> and event handler classes, to better guide you to the various events that correspond to the life cycle of a data operation using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource> control.
trans-unit.target: Tabellen nedenfor viser hendelsene og tilknyttede <xref:System.EventArgs>og behandlingsprogrammet klasser, til å lede deg bedre på ulike hendelser som tilsvarer livssyklusen for en operasjon som bruker den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource> </xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: |Event|EventArgs|EventHandler| |-----------|---------------|------------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Selecting> occurs before the data is retrieved.|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceSelectingEventArgs>|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceSelectingEventHandler>| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Inserting>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Updating>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Deleting> occur before an insert, update, or delete operation is performed.|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceCommandEventArgs>|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceCommandEventHandler>| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Selected>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Inserted>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Updated>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Deleted> occur after the data retrieval, insert, update, or delete operations completes.|SqlDataSourceStatusEventArgs|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceStatusEventHandler>|
trans-unit.target: | Hendelsen | EventArgs kan | EventHandler | |-----------|---------------|------------------| | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Selecting>forekommer før data som hentes. | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceSelectingEventArgs>| <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceSelectingEventHandler>| | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Inserting>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Updating>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Deleting>forekomme før en insert-, update eller delete-operasjonen utføres. | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceCommandEventArgs>| <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceCommandEventHandler>| | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Selected>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Inserted>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Updated>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Deleted>inntreffer etter henting av data, insert, update eller slette operasjoner er fullført. | SqlDataSourceStatusEventArgs | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceStatusEventHandler>|</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceStatusEventHandler></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Deleted></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Updated></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Inserted></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Selected></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceCommandEventHandler></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceCommandEventArgs></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Deleting></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Updating></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Inserting></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceSelectingEventHandler></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceSelectingEventArgs></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Selecting>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceStatusEventArgs"></xref> class, using the specified output parameters, return value, and number of rows affected by the database operation.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceStatusEventArgs"> </xref> class, ved hjelp av den angitte utdataparametere returverdien og antall rader som er berørt av databaseoperasjonen.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbCommand"></xref> that represents the database query, command, or stored procedure that is submitted to the database by the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbCommand"> </xref> som representerer databasespørringen, kommandoen eller lagret prosedyre som er sendt til databasen ved den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The number of rows affected by the database operation, if applicable.
trans-unit.target: Antall rader som er berørt av databaseoperasjonen, hvis det er aktuelt.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Exception> thrown by the database operation, if applicable.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Exception>forårsaket av databaseoperasjonen, hvis det er aktuelt.</xref:System.Exception>

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of rows affected by a database operation.
trans-unit.target: Henter hvor mange rader som er berørt av en databaseoperasjon.

trans-unit.source: All operations return the number of rows affected by the operation.
trans-unit.target: Alle operasjoner returnerer antall rader som er berørt av operasjonen.

trans-unit.source: The AffectedRows property has the same value as the return value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Update%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Insert%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Delete%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen AffectedRows har samme verdi som returverdien for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Update%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Insert%2A>, og <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Delete%2A>metoder.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Delete%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Insert%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Update%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Select%2A> method is called and the data source is set to <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceMode> mode, the return value is 0 in all cases.
trans-unit.target: Når den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Select%2A>metoden og datakilden er satt til <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceMode>modus, returverdien er 0 i alle tilfellene.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceMode> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Select%2A>

trans-unit.source: The number of rows affected by a database operation.
trans-unit.target: Antall rader som er berørt av en databaseoperasjon.

trans-unit.source: The default value is -1.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er -1.

trans-unit.source: Gets the database command submitted to the database.
trans-unit.target: Henter database-kommandoen som er sendt til databasen.

trans-unit.source: You can handle the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Selected>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Updated>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Inserted>, or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Deleted> event to examine and manipulate the properties of the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommand> after it is submitted by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource> control to the database.
trans-unit.target: Kan du behandle den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Selected>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Updated>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Inserted>, eller <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Deleted>-hendelsen for å undersøke og endre egenskaper for det <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommand>etter at det sendes av den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource>kontrollen i databasen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource> </xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommand> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Deleted> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Inserted> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Updated> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Selected>

trans-unit.source: The Command property enables you to access return values and values in any output parameters after the database operation is performed through its <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommand.Parameters%2A> property, as well as the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommand.CommandText%2A> property, which represents the SQL query, command, or stored procedure name that was submitted to the database.
trans-unit.target: Kommandoegenskapen får du tilgang til returverdier og verdier i alle utdataparametere etter databaseoperasjonen utføres via den <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommand.Parameters%2A>egenskapen som det <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommand.CommandText%2A>-egenskapen som representerer SQL-spørring, kommandoen eller lagret prosedyrenavn som ble sendt til databasen.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommand.CommandText%2A> </xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommand.Parameters%2A>

trans-unit.source: Any output parameters are specifically from parameters that have an <xref:System.Data.ParameterDirection> or <xref:System.Data.ParameterDirection> value for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter.Direction%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter> object.
trans-unit.target: Utdataparametere er spesielt fra parametere som har en <xref:System.Data.ParameterDirection>eller <xref:System.Data.ParameterDirection>verdi den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter.Direction%2A>for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter>objektet.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter.Direction%2A> </xref:System.Data.ParameterDirection> </xref:System.Data.ParameterDirection>

trans-unit.source: A return value is from a parameter that has a <xref:System.Data.ParameterDirection> value.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer en verdi er fra en parameter som har en <xref:System.Data.ParameterDirection>verdi.</xref:System.Data.ParameterDirection>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbCommand"></xref> object that represents the database command submitted to the database.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbCommand"> </xref> objektet som representerer database-kommandoen som er sendt til databasen.

trans-unit.source: Gets a wrapper for any exceptions thrown by the database during a data operation.
trans-unit.target: Henter en tekstbryting for alle unntak fra databasen under en data-operasjon.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Exception> property does not represent the actual exception thrown by the database operation.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Exception>egenskapen representerer ikke det faktiske unntaket som databaseoperasjonen.</xref:System.Exception>

trans-unit.source: You can access the thrown exception using the <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Du har tilgang til et unntak ved hjelp av den <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Exception> that wraps any exceptions thrown by the database in its <xref:System.Exception.InnerException*> property.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Exception>som bryter unntak av databasen i den <xref:System.Exception.InnerException*>egenskapen.</xref:System.Exception.InnerException*> </xref:System.Exception>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether an exception thrown by the database has been handled.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om et unntak av databasen har blitt behandlet.

trans-unit.source: If the database throws an exception, the ExceptionHandled property is set to `false` and the exception is wrapped by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceStatusEventArgs.Exception%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Hvis det oppstår et unntak for databasen, ExceptionHandled-egenskapen er satt til `false` og unntaket brytes av den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceStatusEventArgs.Exception%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceStatusEventArgs.Exception%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you use an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceStatusEventHandler>, you can check the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceStatusEventArgs.Exception%2A> property and handle the exception.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du bruker en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceStatusEventHandler>, kan du kontrollere den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceStatusEventArgs.Exception%2A>egenskapen og referansen unntaket.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceStatusEventArgs.Exception%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceStatusEventHandler>

trans-unit.source: If you handle the exception, set the ExceptionHandled property to `true` or the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource> control will throw an exception.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du håndtere unntaket, angi ExceptionHandled egenskapen `true` eller <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource>kontrollen vil Iverksett et unntak.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if an exception thrown by the database has been handled and should not be thrown by the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource"></xref> control; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis et unntak av databasen er håndtert og bør ikke bli utløst av den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource"> </xref> kontrollere; ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.
